tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE signal_timing (
  timing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  signal_id UUID,
  timing_start TIMESTAMP,
  timing_end TIMESTAMP,
  timing_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Lights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    signal_type VARCHAR(20),
    signal_timing INT
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
    pattern_description TEXT,
    signal_ids JSON,
    pattern_timing INT
);

CREATE TABLE signal_history (
   history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   signal_id INT,
   date_time DATETIME,
   change_type VARCHAR(50),
   CONSTRAINT fk_signal FOREIGN KEY (signal_id) REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE signal_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   signal_id INT,
   log_description TEXT,
   log_time DATETIME,
   CONSTRAINT fk_signal_logs FOREIGN KEY (signal_id) REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   signal_id INT,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   CONSTRAINT fk_maintenance FOREIGN KEY (signal_id) REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
    signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    cycle_time INT,
    green_time INT,
    yellow_time INT,
    red_time INT
)

CREATE TABLE signal_timing (
    timing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signal_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
    CONSTRAINT fk_signal_id
        FOREIGN KEY (signal_id)
        REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    purpose VARCHAR(100),
    signal_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_signal_id
        FOREIGN KEY (signal_id)
        REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    speed INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_camera_id
        FOREIGN KEY (camera_id)
        REFERENCES traffic_cameras(camera_id)
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    severity VARCHAR(20)
)
